abstract: Two large acquisitions in the coming year will probably guide the board on who should get the top job.
snippet: Two large acquisitions in the coming year will probably guide the board on who should get the top job.
lead_paragraph: Succession planning is a big deal at most public companies. For the first time in 124 years, General Electric’s may be determined by deal making. As Jeff Immelt nears retirement, the progress of two large acquisitions in the coming year will help guide G.E.’s board on who should get the top job.

headline.main: G.E.’s Next C.E.O. Could Come From Current Deals
